content.title: Have you got what you need?
content.body:
Here in the ALLOY team we usually like to start with a good amount of information before we begin; everything from sketches and notes, mockups and wire-frames, to prototypes and style-guides.

View the Toolkit

content.title: Create
content.body: Alloy takes the approach of atomic based design - so rather than creating an entire page from top to bottom it is usually better to create each object separately so they can be re-used within the many modules of your creation. So you simply create the modules for your site individually - but just like you always did.

content.title: Save for later
content.body:
Pull your modules back into ALLOY, spiting up the module design, content and style in a simple structure.

  • mymodule.less
  • mymodule.json
  • mymodule.hbs

content.title: Build up your library
content.body: Make your process faster, your UI's more complete, your code more friendly, your modules more feature complete with every iteration.
